name: Ema John
details: There are so many products
You can buy how many you want
You can add them to your cart for buy letter
You can calculate price of those products in cart
You can remove them too from your cart
After review your order you have to give your valid address to delivery them
After submit this address form, it will be placed to order
You can cancel your orders too
